channel.title: [DELTA] Error in the Run.bat [317]
channel.description:
I was adding shops to my Rsps, After that I got this Error:
[code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 50000" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:88) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:33) at server.main(server.java:179) [/code]
Does anyone has suggestions to fix this?

item.title: [DELTA] Error in the Run.bat [317]
item.dc:creator: @1v2l3a4m5e6n 1v2l3a4m5e6n
item.description:
@1v2l3a4m5e6n wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:8, topic:368432”][quote author=teufel link=topic=464584.msg3398049#msg3398049 date=1289660119]
Did you use space? YYou have to use tabs everywere
[/quote]
This.
Be sure to tab all the provided 50,000’s. (unspace first, then tab)[/quote]
This was the Problem, Thx everyone for helping me out.

This can be locked.

Read full topic

teufel:

Did you use space? YYou have to use tabs everywere

This.
Be sure to tab all the provided 50,000’s. (unspace first, then tab)

item.title: [DELTA] Error in the Run.bat [317]
item.dc:creator: @1v2l3a4m5e6n 1v2l3a4m5e6n
item.description:
@1v2l3a4m5e6n wrote:

[quote=“pasta186, post:2, topic:368432”]You have messed up something in your shops file
Maybe missed out a ‘tab’ or type something which isnt possible?Have a look.[/quote]
Okay, Thx.
I’ll have a look.

Edit:

I can’t find any mistakes :S
This is what it looks like:

//-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount shop = 1 Pk_Shop 1 1 5698 100000 6106 50000 6109 50000 6108 50000 6107 50000 544 50000 542 50000 2434 100000 2448 100000 2436 100000 2440 100000 6527 10000000 385 10000 1333 10000 1305 500000 4587 500000 shop = 2 Ranged_Store 1 1 2503 100000 2499 100000 2497 100000 2493 100000 1135 100000 1099 100000 2581 50000000 2577 50000000 4212 1500000 892 1000 886 500 882 500 868 50000 859 50000 853 50000 841 50000 [ENDOFSHOPLIST]
